H0.text: Which Italian fashion designer was shot dead on the steps of his Miami mansion in 1997. Roberto Cavalli

H1.text: Which Italian fashion designer was shot dead on the steps of his Miami mansion in 1997. Giorgio Armani

H2.text: Which Italian fashion designer was shot dead on the steps of his Miami mansion in 1997. Valentino Garavani

H3.text: Which Italian fashion designer was shot dead on the steps of his Miami mansion in 1997. Giani Versaci

A4.text: On 15 July 1997, he was murdered outside his Miami Beach mansion, Casa Casuarina, by serial killer Andrew Cunanan.
